properties.description: This innovative sunscreen formulation combines effective emulsification compounds and solubilizers to enhance the stability and photostability of active ingredients like avobenzone and dibenzoylmethane, providing superior UV protection. Enriched with a blend of organic and inorganic blockers, antioxidants, and moisturizing agents, this emulsion ensures optimal skin protection against harmful UV radiation while maintaining a lightweight, non-greasy feel.
